mapper.select: SELECT QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID AS QESTNR_TMPLAT_ID, QUSTNR_TMPLAT_TY AS QESTNR_TMPLAT_TY FROM COMTNQUSTNRTMPLAT
mapper.update: UPDATE COMTNQUSTNRIEM SET IEM_SN=#{iemSn}::NUMERIC, IEM_CN=#{iemCn}, ETC_ANSWER_AT=#{etcAnswerAt}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = NOW(), LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} WHERE QUSTNR_IEM_ID = #{qustnrIemId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.QUSTNR_QESITM_ID AS QESTNR_QESITM_ID, (SELECT QESTN_CN FROM COMTNQUSTNRQESITM WHERE QUSTNR_QESITM_ID = A.QUSTNR_QESITM_ID) QESTNR_QESITM_CN, A.QESTNR_ID, (SELECT QUSTNR_SJ FROM COMTNQESTNRINFO WHERE QESTNR_ID = A.QESTNR_ID) QESTNR_CN, A.IEM_SN, A.QUSTNR_IEM_ID, A.IEM_CN, A.ETC_ANSWER_AT, A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID AS QESTNR_TMPLAT_ID, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNQUSTNRIEM A WHERE 1=1 AND A.QUSTNR_IEM_ID = #{qustnrIemId}

SELECT A.QUSTNR_QESITM_ID AS QESTNR_QESITM_ID, A.QESTNR_ID, A.IEM_SN, A.QUSTNR_IEM_ID, A.IEM_CN, A.ETC_ANSWER_AT, A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID AS QESTNR_TMPLAT_ID, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE ESNTL_ID = A.FRST_REGISTER_ID) FRST_REGISTER_NM, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNQUSTNRIEM A WHERE 1=1
AND IEM_CN LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND FRST_REGISTER_ID IN (SELECT ESNTL_ID FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE USER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNQUSTNRIEM WHERE 1=1
AND IEM_CN LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND FRST_REGISTER_ID IN (SELECT ESNTL_ID FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE USER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%'))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNQUSTNRIEM ( QUSTNR_QESITM_ID, QESTNR_ID, IEM_SN, QUSTNR_IEM_ID, IEM_CN, ETC_ANSWER_AT, QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID )VALUES( #{qestnrQesitmId}, #{qestnrId}, #{iemSn}::NUMERIC, #{qustnrIemId}, #{iemCn}, #{etcAnswerAt}, #{qestnrTmplatId}, NOW(), #{frstRegisterId}, NOW(), #{lastUpdusrId} )
